page.title: 12 Occupation
page.content:
Holidays were enjoyed by all. The majority went abroad to places such as France, Austria and Switzerland.Two families went on a summer cruise and four families spend their winter abroad. To summarise, lifestyles have certainly changed from those of 1086.There is more freedom, more money and more time but is there more happiness? A question which will perhaps remain unanswered.
{OCCUPATION __________
This too was very varied. Within the area there six farmers farming a variety of products for example Dairy was the most prominent, hence the abundance of grassland.
